Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only serves its intended purpose but also embodies a level of excellence that goes beyond expectations. Given its unique features and the care put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than its face value. I'm extending an exclusive opportunity to you by offering this remarkable product for $145. This price reflects the value we place on the product and the opportunity to experience something truly special. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Let me know if you're interested in securing it today. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $145. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $145
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
